attributes.action: Recognise all types of migraines as a serious  disability & not just a headache
attributes.additional_details:
Please see links to below outlining the disability 

https://www.migrainetrust.org/about-migraine/types-of-migraine/hemiplegic-migraine/

https://www.facebook.com/MigraineHemiplegic/
attributes.background: Migraine is a serious disability that affects over 6 million people in the U.K.  Most Sufferers go through various symptoms that disables them.   Hemiplegic Migraine is a rare form of migraine that mimics a stroke . In spite of that some people still class Hemiplegic migraine as just a headache.
